message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant investment for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1100000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to see some more movement. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. Can we discuss further?

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a decent profit. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $1050000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. Can we meet in the middle?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $1025000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1025000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be realistic about what I can afford. I'm thinking more along the lines of $980000. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $1015000, and I'm willing to throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'm including a 2-year warranty and a comprehensive support package.

I appreciate the additional value you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $980000, which is as high as I'm willing to go. If you're willing to accept this price, I'll take the deal. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
